OOC: Sorry... Its been a few days since I haven't posted, right? ^^

Bic:

Ragnar: Roger, Commander, and thanks for the hint.

He moved closer to the forms and brought his arm pod weapons to the 
ground so they would not think of any hostilities in his moves.

Ragnar: Unknown beings, I am Warrior Ragnar of the Maximals. I wish 
to speak with you.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus was still walking to the control room when Ragnar came over 
the comm system.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: If there seems to be no danger, then I suggest you 
make contact. I hope we will be able to bring in a new Maximal.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: warriorazure 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 8:58 AM
>   Subject: Re: Maximal signal/Windlord and Aerotaur.
> 
> 
>   Ragnar stopped just meters from the pod. He looked in all 
directions 
>   to try to catch something on his sensors. As he did, he opened a 
>   commline with the base.
> 
>   Ragnar: Maximal base, this is Bear Alpha. I have arrived at the 
>   designated location. Visual and Infrared scanners indicate no 
threat, 
>   but magres shows two metallic object moving slightly and 
seemingly 
>   humanoid. I await orders. Bear Alpha out.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
>   > Windlord::
>   > 
>   > "I hope that I won't belogn a faction like the named 
Tripedocus" 
>   siad
